title: Just had a Yasuo tell the enemy zac he's gonna bomb his family
body: Like, i'm legit seeing people say stuff similar to this at least twice a day..it's getting really irritating reading stuff like that. I have a screenshot of the chat but Rito don't like you postin that stuff so yee just hope the reports do somethin

replies.body: Not to distract from your very valid point, but why do the champions matter? Are you just trying to take advantage of the Yasuo hate or something?

I've legitimately had people call me c*nt, bitch, tell other teammates to go die, called worthless, arguing all game, etc. and have never once received a notification that they've been "taken care of by the tribunal". Not just one time.
I would tell that Yasuo not to bother, since I invested in force-field technology.
